name: Raccoonundrum
description:
a trashy puzzle game! 🦝
  • The Mazes are infested with RATS!?
  • Help reunite the raccoon with the trashcan!
  • Use arrow keys or wasd to move.
  • Don't let the trashcan or raccoon hit the rats

GitLab Repository: https://gitlab.com/shinysocks/raccoonundrum 

Built with Python Pygame.

To be remade in Unity..
